title: Summoner Names
body: How long does it take for someone to lose their summoner name? I want this name and this guy hasn't played for 2 years yet. Will names ever reset or will he ever lose it?

replies.body: Every account is protected by the [Summoner Name Clean-up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), which allows them to keep their name for a certain time depending on their level.  We aren't able to provide specific dates on when a name might be available or an account's login, so it's all up to you.
I have been waiting for a name for almost a year now and the account on the name has been inactive the whole time and its only LVL 6 What Needs to be done so i can get this name?

Summoner names can go [inactive ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) after a period of time.  For a level 30 account it will take 2 years and 6 months of no games played.
